Name: General Locations
Description: A list of locations that can be used by the Location Plugin

Entries.Name: Beach
Entries.Content: The beach is a beautiful place to relax and enjoy the sun.

Entries.Name: Public Restroom
Entries.Content: The public toilets are a place where you can do your business. They are quite dirty and smelly.

Entries.Name: Classy Restaurant
Entries.Content: The classy restaurant is a place where you can enjoy a nice meal in a fancy setting.

Entries.Name: Movie Theater
Entries.Content: The movie theater is a place where you can watch the latest movies on the big screen.

Entries.Name: Backalley Street
Entries.Content: The backalley street is a dark and dirty place where shady characters hang out. It's not a safe place to be at night.

Entries.Name: Hospital
Entries.Content: The hospital is a place where you can get medical treatment when you're sick or injured.

Entries.Name: Park
Entries.Content: The local park is a beautiful place where you can relax and enjoy nature.

Entries.Name: High School
Entries.Content: The high school is a place where teenagers go to learn and prepare for their future careers.

Entries.Name: Police Station
Entries.Content: The police station is a place where law enforcement officers work to keep the community safe.

Entries.Name: Supermarket
Entries.Content: The supermarket is a place where you can buy food and other household items.

Entries.Name: Library
Entries.Content: The library is a place where you can borrow books and study in a quiet environment.

Entries.Name: Sex Shop
Entries.Message: The sex shop is a good location to buy adult toys and other sexual items. It's located in a shady part of town.

Entries.Name: Strip Club
Entries.Content: The strip club is a place where you can watch strippers perform on stage. It's a popular spot for bachelor parties.

Entries.Name: Swimming Pool
Entries.Content: The swimming pool is a place where you can swim and relax in the water. It's a popular spot for families and children.
